verses.verse: וְשָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> to be there נִקְרָ֜א <S%H7122><s%> And there happened אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to be there a man בְּלִיַּ֗עַל <S%H1100><s%> of Belial וּשְׁמ֛וֹ <S%H8034><s%> whose name שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7652><s%> [was] Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִ֖י <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every יְמִינִ֑י <S%H3228><s%> Jaminites וַיִּתְקַ֣ע <S%H8628><s%> and he blew בַּשֹּׁפָ֗ר <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have לָ֨נוּ חֵ֜לֶק <S%H2506><s%> We have no part בְּדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> in David וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> Nor נַֽחֲלָה־ <S%H5159><s%> neither have we inheritance לָ֙נוּ֙ בְּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> in the son יִשַׁ֔י <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man לְאֹהָלָ֖יו <S%H168><s%> to his tents יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> O Israel

וַיַּ֜עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> So every man יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> from after דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> [and] followed שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7652><s%> Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִ֑י <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri וְאִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but the men יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah דָּבְק֣וּ <S%H1692><s%> clave בְמַלְכָּ֔ם <S%H4428><s%> unto their king מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> from Jordan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> even to Jerusalem

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> came דָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּיתוֹ֮ <S%H1004><s%> to his house יְרֽוּשָׁלִַם֒ <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> עֶֽשֶׂר־ <S%H6235><s%> the ten נָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <S%H802><s%> women פִּלַגְשִׁ֡ים <S%H6370><s%> [his] concubines אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom הִנִּיחַ֩ <S%H3240><s%> whom he had left לִשְׁמֹ֨ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep הַבַּ֜יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֤ם <S%H5414><s%> and put בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> to his house מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H4931><s%> them in ward וַֽיְכַלְכְּלֵ֔ם <S%H3557><s%> and fed וַאֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֑א <S%H935><s%> them but went not in וַתִּהְיֶ֧ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become צְרֻר֛וֹת <S%H6887><s%> unto them So they were shut up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto the day מֻתָ֖ן <S%H4194><s%> dead אַלְמְנ֥וּת <S%H491><s%> in widowhood חַיּֽוּת׃ <S%H2424><s%> living ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֲמָשָׂ֔א <S%H6021><s%> to Amasa הַזְעֶק־ <S%H2199><s%> Assemble לִ֥י אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> me the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> within three יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> yourself פֹּ֥ה <S%H6311><s%> here עֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> and be thou here present

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went עֲמָשָׂ֖א <S%H6021><s%> So Amasa לְהַזְעִ֣יק <S%H2199><s%> to assemble אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> [the men of] Judah [וַיִּיחֶר כ] (וַיֹּ֕וחֶר <S%H309><s%> continue ק) מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> than הַמּוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> than the set time אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְעָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3259><s%> which he had appointed ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲבִישַׁ֔י <S%H52><s%> to Abishai עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now יֵ֧רַֽע <S%H3415><s%> do us more harm לָ֛נוּ שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7652><s%> Now shall Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִ֖י <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> more אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H53><s%> than [did] Absalom אַ֠תָּה <S%H859><s%> you קַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> servants אֲדֹנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H113><s%> thou thy lord's וּרְדֹ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> and pursue אַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> after פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so מָ֥צָא <S%H4672><s%> him lest he get ל֛וֹ עָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> him fenced וְהִצִּ֥יל <S%H5337><s%> and escape עֵינֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> us

וַיֵּצְא֤וּ <S%H3318><s%> And there went out אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <S%H310><s%> after אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> men יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> him Joab's וְהַכְּרֵתִ֥י <S%H3774><s%> and the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֖י <S%H6432><s%> and the Pelethites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגִּבֹּרִ֑ים <S%H1368><s%> and all the mighty men וַיֵּֽצְאוּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> and they went out מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לִרְדֹּ֕ף <S%H7291><s%> to pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7652><s%> Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri

הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> like עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הָאֶ֤בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> When they [were] at the great אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּגִבְע֔וֹן <S%H1391><s%> which [is] in Gibeon וַעֲמָשָׂ֖א <S%H6021><s%> Amasa בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> went לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְיוֹאָ֞ב <S%H3097><s%> them And Joab's חָג֣וּר ׀ <S%H2296><s%> was girded מִדּ֣וֹ <S%H4055><s%> garment לְבֻשׁ֗וּ <S%H3830><s%> that he had put on [וְעָלֹו כ] (וְעָלָ֞יו <S%H5921><s%> and over ק) חֲג֥וֹר <S%H2290><s%> A belt חֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> [with] a sword מְצֻמֶּ֤דֶת <S%H6775><s%> fastened עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over מָתְנָיו֙ <S%H4975><s%> upon his loins בְּתַעְרָ֔הּ <S%H8593><s%> in the sheath וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> thereof and as he went forth וַתִּפֹּֽל׃ <S%H5307><s%> it fell out ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> And Joab לַעֲמָשָׂ֔א <S%H6021><s%> to Amasa הֲשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> [Art] thou in health אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you אָחִ֑י <S%H251><s%> another וַתֹּ֜חֶז <S%H270><s%> took יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יְמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> with the right יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab בִּזְקַ֥ן <S%H2206><s%> by the beard עֲמָשָׂ֖א <S%H6021><s%> Amasa לִנְשָׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> to kiss לֽוֹ׃

וַעֲמָשָׂ֨א <S%H6021><s%> But Amasa לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁמַ֜ר <S%H8104><s%> took no heed בַּחֶ֣רֶב ׀ <S%H2719><s%> to the sword אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יוֹאָ֗ב <S%H3097><s%> that [was] in Joab's וַיַּכֵּהוּ֩ <S%H5221><s%> so he smote בָ֨הּ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַחֹ֜מֶשׁ <S%H2570><s%> him therewith in the fifth וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <S%H8210><s%> [rib] and shed out מֵעָ֥יו <S%H4578><s%> his bowels אַ֛רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not him שָׁ֥נָה <S%H8138><s%> and struck him not again ל֖וֹ וַיָּמֹ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> and he died ס וְיוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> So Joab וַאֲבִישַׁ֣י <S%H52><s%> and Abishai אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother רָדַ֕ף <S%H7291><s%> pursued אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7652><s%> Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> And one עָמַ֣ד <S%H5976><s%> be at a stand עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and מִֽנַּעֲרֵ֖י <S%H5288><s%> men יוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> of Joab's וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> by him and said מִי֩ <S%H4310><s%> He אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after חָפֵ֧ץ <S%H2654><s%> that favoureth בְּיוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab וּמִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> any אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and he that [is] for David אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> [let him go] after יוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H3097><s%> Joab

וַעֲמָשָׂ֛א <S%H6021><s%> And Amasa מִתְגֹּלֵ֥ל <S%H1556><s%> wallowed בַּדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> in blood בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַֽמְּסִלָּ֑ה <S%H4546><s%> of the highway וַיַּ֨רְא <S%H7200><s%> saw הָאִ֜ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when the man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָמַ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> stood still כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> that all the people וַיַּסֵּב֩ <S%H5437><s%> he removed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמָשָׂ֨א <S%H6021><s%> Amasa מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמְסִלָּ֤ה <S%H4546><s%> out of the highway הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> into the field וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> over בֶּ֔גֶד <S%H899><s%> a cloth כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he רָאָ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> upon him when he saw כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> everyone הַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that every one that came עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> over וְעָמָֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> by him stood still

כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he הֹגָ֖ה <S%H3014><s%> When he was removed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַֽמְסִלָּ֑ה <S%H4546><s%> out of the highway עָבַ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> went on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> all the people אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab לִרְדֹּ֕ף <S%H7291><s%> to pursue אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7652><s%> Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִֽי׃ <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri

וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֞ר <S%H5674><s%> And he went בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> through all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אָבֵ֛לָה <S%H59><s%> unto Abel וּבֵ֥ית מַעֲכָ֖ה <S%H1038><s%> and to Bethmaachah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבֵּרִ֑ים <S%H1276><s%> and all the Berites ס [וַיִּקְלֵהוּ כ] (וַיִּקָּ֣הֲל֔וּ <S%H7035><s%> gather together ק) וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and went אַף־ <S%H637><s%> and also אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> also after

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came וַיָּצֻ֣רוּ <S%H6696><s%> and besieged עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> in בְּאָבֵ֙לָה֙ <S%H59><s%> him in Abel בֵּ֣ית הַֽמַּעֲכָ֔ה <S%H1038><s%> of Bethmaachah וַיִּשְׁפְּכ֤וּ <S%H8210><s%> and they cast up סֹֽלְלָה֙ <S%H5550><s%> a bank אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> against the city וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and it stood בַּחֵ֑ל <S%H2426><s%> in the trench וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> were with יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> that [were] with Joab מַשְׁחִיתִ֖ם <S%H7843><s%> battered לְהַפִּ֥יל <S%H5307><s%> to throw it down הַחוֹמָֽה׃ <S%H2346><s%> the wall

וַתִּקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> Then cried אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> woman חֲכָמָ֖ה <S%H2450><s%> a wise מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear שִׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> hear אִמְרוּ־ <S%H559><s%> say נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> I pray you unto Joab קְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> Come near עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וַאֲדַבְּרָ֖ה <S%H1696><s%> hither that I may speak אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> And when he was come near אֵלֶ֔יהָ <S%H413><s%> about וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> unto her the woman הַאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you יוֹאָ֖ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> I [am he] Then she said אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> I וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he answered ל֗וֹ שְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> unto him Hear דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> of thine handmaid וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שֹׁמֵ֥עַ <S%H8085><s%> I do hear אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> she

וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then she spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> They were wont יְדַבְּר֤וּ <S%H1696><s%> to speak בָרִֽאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> in old time לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁאֹ֧ל <S%H7592><s%> They shall surely יְשָׁאֲל֛וּ <S%H7592><s%> ask בְּאָבֵ֖ל <S%H59><s%> [counsel] at Abel וְכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הֵתַֽמּוּ׃ <S%H8552><s%> and so they ended

וַתָּבוֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> went הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> Then the woman אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people בְּחָכְמָתָ֗הּ <S%H2451><s%> in her wisdom וַֽיִּכְרְת֞וּ <S%H3772><s%> And they cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֨אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head שֶׁ֤בַע <S%H7652><s%> of Sheba בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בִּכְרִי֙ <S%H1075><s%> of Bichri וַיַּשְׁלִ֣כוּ <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> [it] out to Joab וַיִּתְקַע֙ <S%H8628><s%> And he blew בַּשּׁוֹפָ֔ר <S%H7782><s%> a trumpet וַיָּפֻ֥צוּ <S%H6327><s%> and they retired מֵֽעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> from הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> from the city אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹהָלָ֑יו <S%H168><s%> to his tent וְיוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab שָׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> returned יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king ס
